content: अपहारः {@--1@} Taking or carrying away, stealing, plundering, removing, killing, destroying; कर्णनासापहारेण भगिनी मे विरूपिता <ls>Rām.</ls> by the cutting of ears and nose; निद्रापहार, विष°. {@--2@} Concealing, dissembling; कथमात्मापहारं करोमि <ls>Ś. 1</ls> how shall I dissemble myself, conceal my real name and character; see अपहारक below. {@--3@} Spending or using another's property. {@--4@} Loss, damage.
